global.ability_ready: ${ability} is ready to use again, kupo!
global.capped_job_points: Kupo-po! Your Job Points are positively, perfectly, and pristinely peaked!
global.capped_merit_points: Kupo-po! Your Merit Points are maximally, marvelously, and most magically maxed!
global.flavor_text: <1>You're as reliable as a Mog Safe, kupo!</1> <10>Watching you coordinate in battle is like poetry in motion, kupo!</10> <11>Your resourcefulness would make any Moogle proud, kupo!</11> <12>You handle challenges like a true adventurer, kupo!</12> <13>You always keep things kupo-tastic, kupo!</13> <14>Your teamwork is better than a synchronized Mog dance, kupo!</14> <15>The way you help others is Moogle-worthy, kupo!</15> <16>Your cleverness is as crisp and captivating as crystal!</16> <17>Your dedication dazzles like a diamond in the dark!</17> <18>You handle heroic hurdles with heart and harmony, kupo!</18> <19>Your boundless bravery baffles even the bravest beast, kupo!</19> <2>Your adventuring spirit inspires us all, kupo!</2> <20>You masterfully manage your macros with Moogle-level mastery, kupo!</20> <21>Your swift skills in battle are simply stupendous, kupo!</21> <22>Your strategic stance is as sharp as a sword, kupo!</22> <23>Your thoughtful teamwork turns tough tides triumphantly, kupo!</23> <24>You keep calm and collected amidst chaotic clashes, kupo!</24> <25>Your polished prowess packs a powerful punch, kupo!</25> <26>You're as resourceful as a reliable Mog House attendant, kupo!</26> <27>Your tactical talents make every tussle triumphant, kupo!</27> <28>You're as legendary as the Lost Library of the Moogles, kupo!</28> <29>Your wonderous will wins wonderful victories, kupo!</29> <3>Your gear is shinier than a polished Gil, kupo!</3> <30>Kupo! Did I remember to fluff my pom today?</30> <31>Oh, my fur feels extra fabulous today, Kupo!</31> <32>Kupo... was that a Gil I just saw sparkle?</32> <33>Hmm, I wonder what adventurers eat for dinner. Kupo snacks?</33> <34>Kupo-po! I must polish my pom-pom more often!</34> <35>If I were a treasure chest, where would I hide? Kupo?</35> <36>Kupo! Is it time to reorganize the Mog Safe again?</36> <37>Pom-pom power always gets the job done, Kupo!</37> <38>Kupo-po! I hope adventurers appreciate my Mogical assistance!</38> <39>Hmm... do adventurers dream of Moogles, Kupo?</39> <4>Your kindness lights up the Mog House, kupo!</4> <40>Kupo! Maybe I should learn a new Moogle dance!</40> <41>Oh, dear Kupo! I've misplaced my polishing cloth again!</41> <42>Kupo! Is that shiny gear I spy? Marvelous!</42> <43>I wonder if I could fit in an adventurer's backpack, Kupo!</43> <44>Kupo-po! The stars are twinkling like Mog crystals tonight!</44> <45>If I had wings, Kupo, I'd fly to the highest treasure trove!</45> <46>Kupo! I mustn't forget my Moogle meditation exercises.</46> <47>Hmm, I should write a book: 'The Art of Pom-pom Polishing.'</47> <48>Kupo! A tidy Mog House is a happy Mog House!</48> <49>Oh, Kupo! A nap sounds delightful right now.</49> <5>You handle battles with the finesse of a seasoned Moogle, kupo!</5> <50>Kupo! Polished pom-poms make perfect presentations!</50> <51>Kupo! Shiny stones and sparkling stars soothe my soul!</51> <52>Kupo-po! A marvelous Moogle must maintain meticulous manners!</52> <53>Kupo! My fluffy fur feels fantastically fresh today!</53> <54>Kupo! I'd love a lazy lounge on a luminous log!</54> <55>Kupo! Treasure troves tantalize this tiny traveler!</55> <56>Kupo! Brilliant baubles bring boundless bliss!</56> <57>Oh, Kupo! Daring deeds demand diligent determination!</57> <58>Kupo! Fuzzy friends foster fabulous fun!</58> <59>Kupo-po! Tidy trunks and terrific treasures take top priority!</59> <6>You're like a walking treasure trove of good ideas, kupo!</6> <60>Kupo! Adventurers adore adorably attentive assistants!</60> <61>Kupo! Pondering precious possibilities perks up my pom!</61> <62>Kupo! Calm caves and colorful crystals create cozy comfort!</62> <63>Kupo! Sparkling skies soothe this small seeker!</63> <64>Kupo! Nimble negotiations nurture notable notoriety!</64> <65>Kupo-po! Wondrous wonders wait within wild woods!</65> <66>Kupo! Loyal leaders love learning lively lore!</66> <67>Kupo! Moggy mischief makes marvelous memories!</67> <68>Oh, Kupo! Brave battles bring brilliant bounties!</68> <69>Kupo! Patient preparation produces perfect performance!</69> <7>You make adventuring look like a dance, kupo!</7> <8>Your dedication would impress even King Kupofried, kupo!</8> <9>Your lockstyle is as fashionable as a Moogle hat, kupo!</9>
global.food_wears_off: Kupo! Your marvelous meal is all gone! Maybe a Moogle-approved meal to munch on?

info.introduction: Your handy Helper, the marvelous magical Moogle, master of multitasking, at your service!
info.name: Moogle

global.mireu_popped: Mireu has been mentioned in ${zone}, kupo!
global.other_party_joined_alliance: Another party has joined the alliance, kupo!
global.other_party_left_alliance: A party has left the alliance, kupo!
global.party_low_mp: Looks like ${member} could use a ${refresh}, kupo!
global.reminder_canteen: Kupo-ho! A fresh Mystical Canteen is ripe for the refilling!
global.reminder_mog_locker: Kupo-po! Your marvelous Mog Locker lease is nearing its nerve-wracking nullification! Better renew, kupo!
global.reminder_moglophone: Kupo-kwee! Another Moglophone has managed to materialize!
global.reminder_plate: Kupo-po! Your Shiny Ra'Kaznarian Plate is polished and prepared!
global.reraise_check: Kupo-po! You're prancing perilously without proper protective precautions! No Reraise, no revival, kupo!
global.reraise_wears_off: Kupo-kupo! Your reliable Reraise has rudely run off - reapply before you regret it!
global.signet_wears_off: Kupo-po! Your beautiful ${signet} has blinked away - best bounce to a guard before it's too late!
global.sparkolade_reminder: Kupo-ho! Sparkolades are stacking sky-high - so be sure to spend them swiftly, savvy shopper!
global.sublimation_charged: Sublimation is fully charged and ready, kupo!
global.vorseal_wearing: Only about 10 minutes left on your Vorseal effect, so stay sharp, kupo!
global.you_are_now_alliance_leader: You're now the alliance leader, kupo!
global.you_are_now_party_leader: You're now the party leader, kupo!
global.your_party_joined_alliance: Your party has joined an alliance, kupo!
global.your_party_left_alliance: Your party has left the alliance, kupo!
